title: AP38: Riviera Line Scenario Pack BR 1980s
description:
Armstrong Powerhouse presents a scenario pack for the Riviera Line: Exeter to Paignton route which turns back the clock to 1983 when loco-hauled trains reigned supreme and Summer Saturdays were a hive of activity. This pack is perfect for evoking those memories of childhood holidays in Dawlish or for those too young, to see what it was like seeing these loud diesels hurtle along the sea wall.

In these scenarios, we've strived for realism in all areas. For example, each scenario represents actual workings featured in the 1983/1984 working timetable to create an as realistic experience as possible. As well as this, prototypical rolling stock formations are used where possible with all services having their headcode, time of leaving, origin and destination as their name so you can see which train is which!

On top of this, we have colour matched all BR liveried stock used in this pack to the best of our ability to give consistency and a more immersive experience; something that has perhaps been lacking in previous BR-era scenarios. If that wasn't enough, we have also developed a number of high definition reskins for the rolling stock listed below:

Class 31

Class 33

Class 43 + Mk3 coaches (HST)

Class 47

Requirements

Extra Stock - Download
